summary: "Viking Chainmail Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor or light armor set for all genders and races. I found there to be a serious lack of chainmail in Skyrim. Now you can wear an authentic looking Viking chainmail set as you maraud the Northlands! If you prefer a simple and realistic look, this set is for you.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/knCHw.png[/img]

[center]An armor mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KlPiy.png[/img]
"Viking Chainmail Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor or light armor set for all genders and races. I found there to be a serious lack of chainmail in Skyrim. Now you can wear an authentic looking Viking chainmail set as you maraud the Northlands! If you prefer a simple and realistic look, this set is for you.

I have had countless requests for an authentic, historical, Viking themed set of armor. So here it is - you have been heard!

There is a light and heavy version with unique looks. The armor also comes with a new shield in Viking theme, and multiple helmet options.

This armor scales to weight, works on all races and both genders.

The heavy armor is similar to Ebony in it's stats, and thus requires the Ebony perk to craft. The light set is similar to Glass in it's stats, so you will need that perk for the light set.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/0zHA8.png[/img][youtube]F-ZnM_Bn2tc[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/0zHA8.png[/img]

Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/J28KD.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/dWHJ8.png[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ltaRw.png[/img]
hothtrooper44 - Viking Chainmail Armor
Bethesda - Skyrim and it's assets
Part of the heavy helmet's meshes and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used here with permission. The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com/
Idibil, Brust Fully, Brustwarzen Lenny and the Brytenwalda Team - I used/altered/adapted some textures made by this modding team, thanks!
Nate Hallahan of Hammerwing Studios for the spectacle helmet mesh, www.hammerwingstudios.com
OceanRage, Midhras - inspiration and ideas!
